Paragraph: With this model we investigated the effect of chronic doxorubicin administration on the ECG of freely moving BALB / c mice and the efficacy of ICRF - 187 as a protective agent .

| --- |
| Chronic doxorubicin administration |
| ICRF-187 |

Note: ICRF-187 is not a disease, but rather a protective agent that is being investigated for its potential to prevent or mitigate the effects of chronic doxorubicin administration. Therefore, it is not included in the list of diseases.
